General.Name: Chenbro Micom Co Ltd
General.Description: Chenbro Micom Co., Ltd. engages in the design, manufacture, processing, and trading of computer peripheral equipment. It offers barebone servers; rackmount, tower server, and PC chassis products; storage expansion kits; and OEM/JDM services. The company is also involved in the software design activities; and export and import of computer supplies and peripheral equipment. It operates in the United States, China, Taiwan, Singapore, and internationally. The company was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 558, Zhongyuan Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 242030
